pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Structure Component Analysis- Latent Class Analysis // Execute Latent Class Analysis (LCA) by using Generalized Structured Component Analysis (GSCA). This is explained in Ryoo, Park, and Kim (2009) doi:10.1007/s41237-019-00084-6. It estimates the parameters of latent class prevalence and item response probability in LCA with a single line comment. It also provide graphs of item response probabilities.
